name: Bound n Shoot
description:
try surviving 5 min while you uncontrollably move up and down

kill enemies to get powerful upgrades

controls:

A and D to move, W to select or slow down

you can also use arrow keys 

assets: sfx:

blip-plock-pop by onikage22 https://freesound.org/s/240566/

some sfx created using chiptone by sfbgames https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

fonts:

m3x6 by Daniel Linssen https://managore.itch.io/m3x6

magofont1 by nimblebeastscollective https://nimblebeastscollective.itch.io/magosfonts
